snippet: Nigeria and Iran delivered the first draw of the World Cup in their opening match in Group F.
abstract: World Cup Roundup; Nigeria and Iran deliver first draw of World Cup, coming to 0-0 stalemate; other tournament news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria and Iran delivered the first draw of the World Cup in their opening match in Group F.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Nigeria and Iran Play to Tournament’s First Draw
headline.print_headline: Match Is a Tie Between Iran and Nigeria
